TextBlock.Text: PILEA: Now remember, children, the path to our settlement may be scary, but just remember to stay big!
PILEA: The hoppers and anglerfish aren't so scary when they're smaller than you! But don't get too large or you won't fit in the town anymore!
PILEA: Now what do we do if we're too small?
TAXUS: Go through the black hole!
TSUGA: Ask a bigger Nomai for help!
PILEA: Yes! If it's safe to do so, the black hole will let you keep your bigger size when you return!
PILEA: Also correct! If it's not safe to travel, a bigger Nomai can scare off the hoppers for you!
